item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: It was nice to see all the happy faces heading to the first day of school in the riding this morning. I wish them a successful year.

item.title: Mentioned by Financial Post
item.description:
A cabinet shuffle to avoid the impossible
This week's take-that-Justin cabinet shuffle was sold as all about rejuvenation and the promotion of women in politics, but one of the best decisions was to maintain the cabinet's oldest member, Joe Oliver, at Natural Resources. Meanwhile Nunavut MP Leona ...

item.title: Mentioned by DigitalJournal.com (press release)
item.description:
Community and Labour and Activists Demand Real Change to Temporary ...
TORONTO, June 10, 2013 /CNW/ - Dozens of community and labour activists converged on Conservative MP Joe Oliver's office today to demand an end to the Harper government's low-wage economic strategy and abuse of temporary foreign workers.

Community and Labour and Activists Demand Real Change to Temporary ...
TORONTO, June 10, 2013 /CNW/ - Dozens of community and labour activists converged on Conservative MP Joe Oliver's office today to demand an end to the Harper government's low-wage economic strategy and abuse of temporary foreign workers.
